title: Ozark National Scenic Riverways: Public Involvement
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Public Involvement              Public Involvement         Big Spring   The park is always interested in your input. From time to time various major projects will be open for comment. At other times we are still interested in your opinions, suggestions and comments. These may be e-mailed or sent in written for to the park:  You may send written comments to: Superintendent, Ozark National Scenic Riverways, P.O. Box 490, Van Buren, MO 63965 Or via e-mail.  (Before including your address, phone number, e-mail address, or other personal identifying information in your comment, you should be aware that your entire comment - including your personal identifying information - may be made publicly available at any time. While you can ask us in your comment to withhold your personal identifying information from public review, we cannot guarantee that we will be able to do so.)
